description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based web application, responsible for mounting the App component inside the DOM element with id 'root'. It imports React, ReactDOM, global CSS, and the main App component, then initializes and renders the React app.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root node.
